summary: Represents the fifth routine antenatal care contact (ANC5) for pregnant women, delivering scheduled ANC5 interventions, additional age‑specific interventions, and handling follow‑up actions such as scheduling the next visit or admitting to an antenatal inpatient ward if complications arise.
business_intent: Provide systematic delivery of fifth‑trimester antenatal services, ensure appropriate clinical interventions based on gestational age, and manage subsequent care pathways to improve maternal health outcomes.
